alternative_parents.description: Inorganic salt compounds containing a chlorine atom either in its ionic form or bonded to another atom (metal or halogen).
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic chloride salts

class.description: Inorganic compounds containing 'other non-metals' and halogen.
class.name: Other non-metal halides

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as other non-metal halides. These are inorganic compounds containing 'other non-metals' and halogen.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic compounds containing 'other non-metals' and halogen.
direct_parent.name: Other non-metal halides

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

superclass.description: Inorganic compounds that contain only metal elements.
superclass.name: Homogeneous non-metal compounds
